Title: Go Tina on the Mountain
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Rich Rinaldi
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Tina befriends a hermit living in the woods when she, Gene and Louise go to Outdoor Education; Bob and Linda see what it's like to be empty-nesters.
